command_no_module: Modules [{mods}] not found for your command
command.about.1: This is the LF OS created by myself.
command.about.2: Here contains some information about me.
command.about.4: If you found any bugs, please open an {issue}.
command.about.5: The source code is available on {github}.
command.env.help:
prints all environment variables
Using `env [key]=[value]` to set environment variable
command.help.text:
Hi, Welcome to the HELP page

Using `help [command]` to get help for a specific command
Using `lscmd` to list all available commands
command.help.help:
Prints this help page
Using `help [command]` to get help for a specific command
command.welcome.1: Type 'help' to see the help page
command.edit.help:
Edit a file
Using `edit ([path1] ([path2] ([path3] (...))))` to open editor and edit files
command.cat.no_permission: No permission to read the file: {path}
command.cat.help:
Prints the content of a file
Using `cat [path1] ([path2] ([path3] (...)))` to print the content of a file
editor.no_permission_read: No permission to read this file
command.chmod.help:
Change permission by using `chmod [perm] [path1] ([path2] ([path3] (...)))`
perm: 'r' for read, 'w' for write,
    use '#' as prefix to set the specific permission
    use '^' as prefix to remove the specific permission
command.ls.help:
List files in a directory
Using `ls [path]` to list files in a directory
command.cd.help:
Change current directory by using `cd [path]`,
or `cd` to change to the home directory
command.exit.back_error: Error occurred when backing to the previous app
command.open.help: Open file as html by using `open [path]`
command.touch.help:
Create file by using `touch [path1] ([path2] ([path3] (...)))`
Arguments:
    -p [perm]: set permission to the files
        'r' for read, 'w' for write, default is none
command.info.help: Print information about the current app
